verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':4969'>نت</tajweed>َقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمَا لَبِإِمَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7293'>مٍ م</tajweed>ُّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fantaqamnā minhum, wa innahumā labi'imāmim mubīn(in).
verses.translation: (За что) Мы с них возмездие взыскали, И они оба полегли на том пути, Что и поныне ясно виден

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْحِجْرِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> كَذَّبَ أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7294'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7295'>جْ</tajweed>رِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7296'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُرْسَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad każżaba aṣḥābul-ḥijril-mursalīn(a).
verses.translation: И обитатели Аль Хиджры Сочли посланников лжецами

verses.text_uthmani: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَكَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَءَاتَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُمْ ءَايَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِنَا فَكَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> عَنْهَا مُعْرِض<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ātaināhum āyātinā fa kānū 'anhā mu'riḍīn(a).
verses.translation: Мы им Свои знамения явили, Они ж от них (упрямо) отвратились

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَانُوا۟ يَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7297'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa kānū yanḥitūna minal-jibāli buyūtan āminīn(a).
verses.translation: И высекали в скалах для себя дома, И думали, что безопасны

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُصْبِحِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7288'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّيْحَةُ مُصْبِح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa akhażathumuṣ-ṣaiḥatu muṣbiḥīn(a).
verses.translation: А на заре их грозный вопль поразил

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَغْنَىٰ عَنْه<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':3985'>ُم م</tajweed>َّا كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَكْسِب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Famā agnā 'anhum mā kānū yaksibūn(a).
verses.translation: И все стяжания (земные) им ни к чему не послужили

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَـَٔاتِيَةٌ ۖ فَٱصْفَحِ ٱلصَّفْحَ ٱلْجَمِيلَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَمَا خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':5159'>قْ</tajweed>نَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7298'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّمَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>تِ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':1474'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِلَّا بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':370'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَقِّ‌ۗ وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7299'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّاعَةَ لَأَتِيَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':7300'>ةٌ‌ۖ ف</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7301'>ٱ</tajweed>صْفَحِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7302'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>صَّفْحَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7303'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>لَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa mā khalaqnas-samāwāti wal-arḍa  wa mā bainahumā illā bil-ḥaqq(i), wa innas-sā'ata la'ātiyatun faṣfaḥiṣ-ṣafḥal-jamīl(a).
verses.translation: Мы сотворили небеса и твердь земли И все, что между ними (суще), По Истине (Господнего Творенья), И непременно Час настанет. Прости же благосклонно им, (о Мухаммад)

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ رَبَّكَ هُوَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7304'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَلَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>قُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7305'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Inna rabbaka huwal-khallāqul-'alīm(u).
verses.translation: Господь твой - истинно, Создатель Высший, Чья мудрость (в проявлении Творенья) безгранична

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ سَبْعًا مِّنَ ٱلْمَثَانِى وَٱلْقُرْءَانَ ٱلْعَظِيمَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> ءَاتَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كَ سَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7306'>بْ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7307'>عًا م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7308'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَثَانِى وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7309'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7310'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad ātaināka sab'am minal-maṡānī wal-qur'ānal-'aẓīm(a).
verses.translation: Тебе Мы дали семь (часто) читаемых айатов И чтение Великого Корана

verses.text_uthmani: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَا تَمُدَّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِۦٓ</tajweed> أَزْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':7311'>جًا م</tajweed>ِّنْهُمْ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7312'>ٱ</tajweed>خْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِلْمُؤْمِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lā tamuddanna 'ainaika ilā mā matta'nā bihī azwājam minhum wa lā taḥzan 'alaihim wakhfiḍ janāḥaka lil-mu'minīn(a).
verses.translation: Не простирай же глаз своих к тем (благам), Что дали Мы на пользу из семей (неверных), И не печалься из-за них, А преклони свое крыло к благочестивым

verses.text_uthmani: وَقُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلنَّذِيرُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقُلْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ِىٓ</tajweed> أَنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7313'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َذِيرُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7314'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa qul innī anan-nażīrul-mubīn(u).
verses.translation: (О Мухаммад!) Скажи: "Я (к вам), поистине, увещеватель ясный

verses.text_uthmani: كَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَى ٱلْمُقْتَسِمِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':515'>نز</tajweed>َلْنَا عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7315'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7316'>قْ</tajweed>تَسِم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Kamā anzalnā 'alal-muqtasimīn(a).
verses.translation: Такой же, как и те, Которых Мы послали к разделяющим (Писание Святое) По предпочтеньям и корысти, А также к тем

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ جَعَلُوا۟ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ عِضِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلَّذِينَ جَعَلُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7317'>ٱ</tajweed>لْقُرْءَانَ عِض<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allażīna ja'alul-qur'āna 'iḍīn(a).
verses.translation: Которые Коран разбили на обрывки

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسْـَٔلَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسْــَٔلَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':825'>جْ</tajweed>مَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa wa rabbika lanas'alannahum ajma'īn(a).
verses.translation: А потому, (о Мухаммад!), В знак (имени) Владыки твоего Мы непременно призовем их всех к ответу

verses.text_uthmani: عَمَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَعْمَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: 'Ammā kānū ya'malūn(a).
verses.translation: За все дела их (и поступки)

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>صْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4314'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُشْرِك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Faṣda' bimā tu'maru wa a'riḍ 'anil-musyrikīn(a).
verses.translation: Ты им открыто возвести, О чем повелено тебе, И отвернись от многобожцев

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا كَفَيْنَـٰكَ ٱلْمُسْتَهْزِءِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا كَفَيْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7318'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُسْتَهْزِء<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Innā kafainākal-mustahzi'īn(a).
verses.translation: Мы защитим тебя от тех, Кто над тобой насмешливо глумится

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ٱلَّذِينَ يَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':68'>جْ</tajweed>عَلُونَ مَعَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3975'>ٱ</tajweed>للَّهِ إِلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هًا ءَاخَرَ‌ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Allażīna yaj'alūna ma'allāhi ilāhan ākhar(a), fa saufa ya'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Тех, кто с Аллахом наравне Другого бога призывает. Потом им предстоит узнать

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدْرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> نَعْلَمُ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكَ يَضِيقُ صَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':6262'>دْ</tajweed>رُكَ بِمَا يَقُول<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa laqad na'lamu annaka yaḍīqu ṣadruka bimā yaqūlūn(a).
verses.translation: И знаем Мы уже, Что грудь твоя стесняется (от боли) Всем тем, что говорят они

verses.text_uthmani: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَك<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':5006'>ُن م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4595'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>جِد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa sabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wa kum minas-sājidīn(a).
verses.translation: Так прославляй Владыку твоего И будь средь тех, кто благовейно преклонил колени

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱعْبُدْ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَكَ ٱلْيَقِينُ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed>عْبُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7319'>دْ</tajweed> رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':7320'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نُ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa'bud rabbaka ḥattā ya'tiyakal-yaqīn(u).
verses.translation: Служи (всем сердцем) Богу твоему, Пока не подойдет тот несомненный (Час, Что Им тебе назначен)
